ovdesc.p: This table contains details of the recycling rules, with each record containing details of a particular set of retry conditions.

p.p: Periodic account charges to be retried daily for a period of 30 days, and with partial settlement to take place if the full amount is not available at the end of the period.

desc.p: This ID field is free format enabling the user to define descriptive ids for the records.
This field is used to determine whether full or partial recovery of the outstanding amount will be recovered at the end of the retry period
This is not relevant to AA which has its own conditions which will override any value set in this field.
END partial recovery is allowed at the end of the retry period.
This is a multi valued field.
Contains details of any override applicable to this record.
A maximum of 35 characters may be entered. This is a NOINPUT field.

This field would decide if a RC date (start, end or next retry date) falls on a holiday, what should the system do
Either move the date to next or previous working date
Valid values are FORWARD and BACKWARD
This option is to specify a relative date or a specific day of a month as a start date.
This would be used to offset the START.DATE of the retry process with base date as capture date
Value of this field can either be given as "nn" or "+nn"
where 'nn' is a numeric value between 1 to 31, if "+" does not precedes numeric value
Or can be set as any numeric value between 1 to 99 when preceded by "+" character
This field is reserved for future use
Defines the number of days that the RC.DETAIL record will remain after maturity before being deleted or moved to history.
Defines the number of retry attempts before giving up, it will be the number of days if the frequency is daily
No input if retry period is set
This standard frequency field is used to determine when to attempt a retry.
This field is sub-divided into two elements:

p.p: WEEKLY - Every week or XX number of weeks

MONTHLY -
Twice Monthly or
Monthly every XX months on a specific date

DEFINED - (Must exist EB.FREQUENCY) For example;
LHFYR -Last day in this Mid Year
LQUAT - Last day in this quarter
LYEAR-Last day of this year
LMNTH - Last day of this month
LWEEK - Last day of this week

desc.p: Defines a specific period for example to terminate the retry processing based on the date the transaction was added to the recycler, For example

p.p: M0215 on the 15th of the next month.

desc.p: No input if retry attempts is set.
This field is to indicate whether RC.DETAIL record will be written to the RC.DETAIL.HIST file.

p.p: "YES" indicates that the RC.DETAIL record will be written to RC.DETAIL.HIST after the post maturity period
"NO" or NULL indicates that the detail record will be deleted at the end of the retention period.
